class SXF_ElemBeamBeamHash : public SXF_ElemBucketHash

Interface

SXF_ElemBeamBeamHash()

Description

The ElemBeamBeamHash class implements a beam-beam bucket hash. SXF beam-beam attribute keys are "sigx", "sigy", "xma", "yma", "npart", and "charge".

Member Description

enum Attributes

SXF_ElemBeamBeamHash()

Constructor;

virtual int index(const char* name) const

Map an attribute key to its enum value. Return a corresponding enum value or -1.
